reviewText: the acting and story were way above average for an indigo film..i highly recommend it

This movie looks like it was made exclusively to be aired on Cinemax late at night. There are about half a dozen or more explicit sex scenes that border on hardcore. Tiffany Shepis herself is featured in one of them. She plays Nola, a soulful rock singer who joins the Vinyl Dolls but harbors a secret past with her drug dealer boyfriend who also happens to be in town looking for her.
 This is a male fantasy movie where every girl in the band is [easy] but the rock music they play is marginally good at best.
